township-small-business-chatbot/
├── src/
│   ├── routes/
│   │   ├── index.js  # Customer's main page
│   │   ├── business.js  # Business profile page
│   │   ├── chat.js  # Chat page
│   │   ├── auth.js  # Authentication and registration pages
├── app.js  # Main application entry point
├── models/
│   ├── business.js  # MongoDB schema for businesses
│   ├── chat.js  # MongoDB schema for chat messages
├── config/
│   ├── db.js  # MongoDB configuration
├── public/
│   ├── uploads/  # Directory to store uploaded business pictures/items
